nodes.text: The Sith Sanctum was the Sith headquarters located on Dromund Kaas. The Sith Sanctum had many points of interests, including Darth Thanaton's private library and meditation chamber.
The Sith Sanctum is as old as the Imperial Citadel itself. The Sith Emperor made the Sith Sanctum his home and only a few Sith were allowed to enter his chambers.
